information.reroll: Refreshes all available items in the current store. Can only be used once per store.
information.special: Special cards introduce global effects that impact specific cards or gameplay mechanics. They come in two types: Permanent and Temporary. Temporary cards expire after 3 levels.
information.modifiers: Modifier cards provide unique effects to individual cards, enhancing their capabilities.
information.traditional: Traditional cards are the foundation of the game, used to create poker hands and progress through levels. Neon cards are an upgraded variant that offer double points and an additional +1 multi.
information.power-ups: Power-ups are consumable items that enhance your plays by boosting points or multi.
information.permanent: Permanent cards stay with you until you choose to remove them.
information.temporal: Temporary cards are removed automatically after 3 levels.
